name: Ultimate Sinking Funds Tracker
description: Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?PDFOutput helps automate PDF generation for documents using Notion Database and a Google Doc!No Coding Required, No Technical Skills Needed, Just One-Click Automation!It requires 2 things: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g., {{InvoiceNumber}}, {{ClientName}}). Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching head
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Helps you Keep track of your saving goals in one central location.; Contribute money onto a sinking fund on a timely basis to stay on track toward your savings goals.; Assess any shortfall or excess contribution towards any fund to meet your savings goals.; Access your savings funds tracker from any device, anywhere; Easy categorization for sinking funds.; Simple and intuitive interface for easy tracking.; Sinking Funds Overview to help you understand how you want to contribute towards your sinking fund based on priority.; Sinking Funds Report which calculates monthly contributions dynamically as you make savings with time.
